Hero_Bismuth.subtitle: One Body, Two Minds
Hero_Bismuth.description: Bismuth is the fusion of an empty, nameless spellbook and an ordinary blind girl. She moves swiftly and deals sustained ranged damage.
Hero_Bismuth.name: Bismuth

Hero_Lacerta.subtitle: Former Sniper, Hunter Lizard
Hero_Lacerta.description: Lacerta is a former Royal Guard sniper and hunter skilled with firearms and gunpowder. He is used to taking out enemies from a distance.
Hero_Lacerta.name: Lacerta

Hero_Yubar.subtitle: Born of Dreams, God of Stars
Hero_Yubar.description: Yubar is a fantastical being born from dreams, a deity who governs the creation and destruction of stars. He uses powerful magic to deal heavy damage from a distance.
Hero_Yubar.name: Yubar

Hero_Aurena.subtitle: Expelled Sage of the Lunar Arcanum Society
Hero_Aurena.description: Aurena is a sage from the Lunar Arcanum Society who was expelled for researching forbidden knowledge. She is a battle healer who dismantles her own life force to wield its power.
Hero_Aurena.name: Aurena

Hero_Nachia.subtitle: Spirit Mage of the Dream World, Guardian of the Ethereal Forest
Hero_Nachia.description: Nachia is a spirit mage of the dream world and guardian of the Ethereal Forest. She can summon spirits that follow her and fight by her side, dealing steady damage.
Hero_Nachia.name: Nachia

Hero_Mist.subtitle: Duelist of House Verdesilver
Hero_Mist.description: Mist is a brave duelist of noble birth. Her agile fighting style allows her to dodge deadly attacks and quickly take down her enemies.
Hero_Mist.name: Mist

Hero_Vesper.subtitle: Ruthless Inquisitor of the Order of the Sacred Flame
Hero_Vesper.description: Vesper is the leader of the Order of the Sacred Flame and a ruthless inquisitor. He fights at close range, holding back enemies while dealing heavy damage.
Hero_Vesper.name: Vesper

Hero_Husk.subtitle: Manufactured Assassin, Wooden Doll with a Soul
Hero_Husk.description: Shell is the perfect instrument of slaughter, incapable of feeling emotion or pain. An assassin who exploits enemy weaknesses with unpredictable movements, eliminating targets in the most efficient way possible.
Hero_Husk.name: Shell
